name: Looping Zip
description:
Loop around the track by turning clockwise / counterclickwise while hitting the laser and gain as many point as you can.

The game was made to participate in #LOWREZJAM.

This game is made using modified Runny Kit (for HF).

This game is also based on my old game, Runny Square, but with less nasty difficulty and 4 times easier to gain points.

Features

  • Original pixel graphic
  • One-button simple easy to learn gameplay
  • 64x64 pixels resolution, zoomed to 320x320 pixels screen size
  • Play from clockwise or counter-clickwise direction

How to Play

  • Click or space key to turn, depending on the direction mode

Changelog

  • v1 (April 17th, 2016)
    • Game is released.
